mdRecord.dcterms:title: Arts
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Arrington, Rebecca
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The smell of pine and the sound of carols played on a Chapman Stick by Greg Howard added to the festive atmosphere in Newcomb Hall Ballroom last Friday, the first day of the annual Artisan's Bazaar, which ran through the weekend. Sponsered by University Union, the event featured more than 40 East Coast crafters.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
